org.isoron.uhabits.ui.habits.list.views

Class HabitListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • org.isoron.uhabits.ui.habits.list.views.HabitListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, HabitListCache.Listener

    public class HabitListAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
implements HabitListCache.Listener
    Provides data that backs a HabitListView. The data if fetched and cached by a HabitListCache.
